title: IS_RAW_KEY_DOWN
content:
0xD95A7387// IsRawKeyDown
BOOL IS_RAW_KEY_DOWN(int rawKeyIndex);Parameters:rawKeyIndex: Index of raw key from keyboard.Returns: Returns bool value of down state.Gets if the specified rawKeyIndex is pressed down on the keyboard.This will not be triggered if the key is disabled with DISABLE_RAW_KEY_THIS_FRAMEVirtual key codes can be found hereExamples:Luaif IsRawKeyDown(32) then -- KEY_SPACE
    print("Spacebar is down")
end
codeBlocks:
if IsRawKeyDown(32) then -- KEY_SPACE
    print("Spacebar is down")
end
